divs: sighting detailsi���d like to report a weird sighting i had on 6\23\12. i live in canonsburg pa. my family and our neighbors were outside enjoying the warm weather it was after 10pm i believe. in the northern sky we observed orange fireball-like objects traveling south. they appeared about a minute apart for probably half an hour. they were silent, non-blinking and appeared to be traveling at a high altitude. they were not descending. they eventually just blinked out before they reaching the horizon. also when they appeared they sort of just blinked into view. i would say each ball was visible for about 90 seconds. we didn���t count them as we were seeing them but i would guess we saw at least 20 over the course of that 30 minutes. my neighbor was able to video a few of them with his iphone. i haven���t talked to him since but i doubt he would have deleted it. i guess i was wondering if anyone else witnessed this or have heard of similar sightings
